channel.title: The instruction at 0x00007FFF2488C10F referenced memory at... the memory could not be written
channel.description:
I downloaded whonix to Windows 10, and when I run it, it crashes immediately and gives me that popup. The details are: The VM session was aborted.
|Result Code:|E_FAIL (0x80004005)| Component: SessionMachine Interface: Session {c0447716-ff5a-4795-b57a-ecd5fffa18a4}

item.title: The instruction at 0x00007FFF2488C10F referenced memory at... the memory could not be written
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Either try the solution:

http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/whonix-virtualbox-failed-to-start-ns-error-failure-0x80004005-the-vm-session-was-aborted/11471

or use latest whonix.ova version:

http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/whonix-for-virtualbox-15-0-1-7-3-testers-wanted-includes-virtualbox-6-1-20-compatibility-fix/11496
